lead_paragraph: American warplanes have struck nine depots where the group is believed to have stashed tens of millions of dollars.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Drops Bombs Not Just on ISIS, but Its Cash, Too
headline.main: U.S. Drops Bombs Not Just on ISIS, but on Its Cash, Too

snippet: American warplanes have struck nine depots where the group is believed to have stashed tens of millions of dollars.
abstract: United States airstrikes in Iraq, beginning in summer, have targeted storage facilities housing Islamic State's cash hoards; military officials assert tactic significantly incapacitates militant group, while others cite complex blend of revenue streams which makes disrupting Islamic State's finances difficult.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
